akka.event

ActorEventBus

trait ActorEventBus extends EventBus

Represents an EventBus where the Subscriber type is ActorRef

Linear Supertypes
EventBus, AnyRef, Any
Known Subclasses
ActorEventBus, DeathWatch, EventStream, LocalDeathWatch, LoggingBus, RemoteDeathWatch
